table.searchString: eventtype=sitescope_daily sis_monitor="License Usage Monitor" | head 1 | table sis_total_points_avail, sis_total_points_consumed| rename sis_total_points_avail AS "SiteScope Total Points Available" | rename sis_total_points_consumed AS "SiteScope Total Points Consumed"
table.title: SiteScope License Details

chart.searchString: eventtype=sitescope_server_stats "Used Memory" | timechart span=1m avg(sis_used_memory) by host
chart.title: SiteScope Used Memory
